content:
Kyle Miller said:

(Damiano Testa Could the pr/issue emoji bot also add emojis to the first message in a topic whose name contains a pr/issue number?)

This just got merged: if everything goes as planned, the emoji reactions associated to the PR status stay as they were, except that the first message in each thread in #**PR reviews> that mentions the PR number behaves as though it contained the PR number.

Thus, while I would still encourage everyone to provide an explicit link to the PR in each #**PR reviews> thread, the first message should receive emoji updates regardless of whether it contains the PR number in its text.
As with all new automation, please let me know if you notice regressions or non-progressions! :smile:
